enchantment.optional_enchants.ice_bow.de: Give slowness to your enemies when you shoot it
enchantment.optional_enchants.ninja_styl: When you kill any mob or player, you gain a slight speed boost
enchantment.optional_enchants.angry_lumb: When you kill any mob or player, you gain a slight haste boost
enchantment.optional_enchants.betrayer.d: Increases damage dealt to Illager enemies
enchantment.optional_enchants.end_harm.d: Increases damage dealt to End enemies
You can control the levitation effect when you are sneaking
enchantment.optional_enchants.nether_ban: Increases damage dealt to Nether enemies
enchantment.optional_enchants.skyward_sh: Can give levitation to your enemies
enchantment.optional_enchants.gravity_cu: Randomly inflicts the Levitation effect on you during combat
enchantment.optional_enchants.hunting.de: Increases damage dealt to Pigs, Sheeps, Cows, Chicken
enchantment.optional_enchants.auto_smelt: Smelt the block that you mine
enchantment.optional_enchants.wither_asp: Give wither effect to your enemies
enchantment.optional_enchants.poison_asp: Give poison effect to your enemies
enchantment.optional_enchants.slowness_a: Give slowness effect to your enemies
enchantment.optional_enchants.fragile_st: Give weakness effect to your enemies
enchantment.optional_enchants.hungering_: Give weakness effect to your enemies
enchantment.optional_enchants.telekinesi: Allows players to magically retrieve items from a distance
On fully charged shot: arrows explode on contact
enchantment.optional_enchants.ender.desc: On fully charged shot: teleport to arrow hit location
enchantment.optional_enchants.exposing.d: Arrows inflict Glowing, and enemies may take more damage
enchantment.optional_enchants.barbaric.d: Deal more damage the less armor you have
enchantment.optional_enchants.cleaving.d: Pierces a portion of enemy armor
enchantment.optional_enchants.terraformi: Massive increase in mining speed, but blocks drop nothing
enchantment.optional_enchants.berserk.de: The more health you've lost, the more damage you deal
Item stays in inventory after death
